4.4 Integration with Rain Garden Planning
Rain gardens can be sited more effectively by combining mapping data with local hydrology
and runoff information. This supports our edible rain garden initiative, which aims to
combine flood mitigation with food security benefits. Mapping allows for data-driven
placement, ensuring that rain gardens serve the greatest community benefit.
4.5 Action Items
1. Update website materials to reflect traceability proof-of-concept and funding readiness.

2. Identify and apply for funding programs supporting agricultural traceability and food
security.
3. Finalize offline-capable mapping functionality for Android deployment.
4. Explore market pricing and sales channels for standalone mapping subscriptions.
5. Integrate mapping analytics into rain garden pilot site selection.
